tooltip: Create/Add a new track entity list in a selected database.
Copy or move one or more existing track entity lists to a target database.
Permanently remove one or more track entity lists from a selected database.

toolTip: Rename an existing track entity list.

text: Add Tracks to Track Entity List
toolTip: Add additional tracks to an existing track entity list.

text: Remove Tracks from Track Entity List
toolTip: Remove one or more tracks from an existing track entity list.
